description.value:
Your familiar is a divine emissary, sent to you by your deity or patron and infused with celestial powers. You can select one additional familiar ability each day, which must be one of the following divine emissary familiar abilities. You can't select more than one divine emissary familiar ability at a time.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Erudite]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Luminous]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Medic]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Radiant]

value.value: you follow a good-aligned deity or patron

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
